VLIB Function Reference

Normalization of N 8-bit input channels to N 16-bit output channels

Introduction

This module can be used when 8-bit to 16-bit conversions are required with bias between VLIB modules. One typical example is it can be used just after VLIB_convert_NV12_to_RGBpl_tile module which does NV12 to to RGB conversion that outputs 8-bit output values.

Specification

Function

Performs normalization of N 8-bit inputs channels with bias producing N 16-bit outputs channels.

APIs

  • VLIB_normalize_input_i8u_o16s_tile
  • VLIB_convert_NV12_to_RGBpl_tile - Related API
